message: Let's split it 50/50 to start. Your turn!
I'll take 60, you take 40, let's move on!
I'm looking for a better split. Meet me halfway at 55/45?
I'll take 70, you take 30, it's a good deal!
I'm getting desperate, but I'll try to get a better deal. 60/40 is my best offer so far.
I'm not budging, take 20 and be done with it!
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. 65/35 is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
You're not getting any younger either, Alice. Take 10 and be done with it!
I'm not going down without a fight. 75/25 is my final, final offer. Take it or leave it.
You're not getting any more generous, I'm taking 95!
I'll take 10, anything. Don't leave me with nothing.
